column5: Huge Home, amazing location! Beauty and lifestyle abound in this 2017 luxury home built around family and fun! Enjoy all that downtown Austin has to offer with MetroRail a short walk away while shopping, dining and banking are just around the corner! Pets Welcome! The upstairs game room is well equipped with PS4, Foosball, Air Hockey, TV/DVD and a leather sofa! Outdoor dining and a natural gas grill.
